mapper.select: select sc.scno, sc.mno, sc.crt, sc.prfx, sc.titl, sc.cont, sc.repl, sc.sc_rdt, m.name from sc left outer join memb m on sc.mno=m.mno where crt=#{value}
select sc.scno, sc.mno, sc.crt, sc.prfx, sc.titl, sc.cont, sc.repl, sc.sc_rdt, m.name from sc left outer join memb m on sc.mno=m.mno where prfx=#{value}
select sc.scno, sc.mno, sc.crt, sc.prfx, sc.titl, sc.cont, sc.repl, sc.sc_rdt, m.name from sc left outer join memb m on sc.mno=m.mno where sc.mno=#{value}

select sc.scno, sc.mno, sc.crt, sc.prfx, sc.titl, sc.cont, sc.repl, sc.sc_rdt, m.name from sc left outer join memb m on sc.mno=m.mno where sc.crt='faq' and (sc.titl like concat('%',#{value},'%') or sc.cont like concat('%',#{value},'%'))
select scno, mno, crt, prfx, titl, cont, repl, sc_rdt from sc where scno=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into sc(scno, mno, crt, prfx, titl, cont, repl, sc_rdt) values( #{serviceCenterNo}, #{memberNo}, #{category}, #{prefix}, #{title}, #{content}, #{reply}, now());
mapper.update: update sc set scno=#{serviceCenterNo}, mno=#{memberNo}, crt=#{category}, prfx=#{prefix}, titl=#{title}, cont=#{content}, repl=#{reply} where scno=#{serviceCenterNo}
